name: LeftUnilateralAmputationAboveOrBelowKnee
title: Left Unilateral Amputation Above or Below Knee
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a left unilateral amputation procedure, above or below the knee.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying left unilateral amputations above or below the knee.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
